com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite.adapter

Class SQLiteColumn.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite.adapter.SQLiteColumn.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    SQLiteColumn

    public static final class SQLiteColumn.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    The builder instance to construct immutable instance of SQLite column.

        public SQLiteColumn.Builder ownerOf(java.lang.String ownedType)
